title: Design Management Capacity-Building Program for Improving SME Product Innovation Performance

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental statistical knowledge and understanding of organizational learning
context.additional_context: Primarily smartphone-based learning activities, with offline workshops conducted once a month.

learning_goals: Analyzing the Impact of Organizational Learning Capability on Design Management Skills via Structural Equation Modeling
Proposing at least three strategies to develop design management capabilities as dynamic capabilities in SME environments
Designing a project-based hypothesis validation process for measuring product innovation performance

resources: Case Study Package (European Ceramic Tile Industry Case)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
